_description: This package.json defines the Node.js server dependencies, scripts, and metadata for the Task Tracker backend API.
name: server
_name_comment: Package name for the backend server
_main_comment: Entry point file that starts the Express server

scripts._scripts_comment: npm scripts for development, production, and testing
scripts._start_comment: Production script - runs server directly with Node.js
scripts._dev_comment: Development script - auto-restarts server when files change
scripts._test_comment: Runs all tests once using Jest testing framework
scripts._test:watch_comment: Runs tests in watch mode - re-runs when files change
scripts._test:coverage_comment: Runs tests and generates code coverage report

dependencies._dependencies_comment: Production dependencies required for the server to run
dependencies._bcryptjs_comment: Library for hashing passwords securely before storing in database
dependencies._cors_comment: Express middleware to enable Cross-Origin Resource Sharing for frontend-backend communication
dependencies._dotenv_comment: Loads environment variables from .env file into process.env
dependencies._express_comment: Fast, minimalist web framework for Node.js - handles HTTP requests and routing
dependencies._jsonwebtoken_comment: Library for creating and verifying JWT tokens for stateless authentication
dependencies._mongodb_comment: Official MongoDB driver for Node.js - low-level database operations
dependencies._mongoose_comment: MongoDB object modeling library - provides schema-based solution and easier database operations

devDependencies._devDependencies_comment: Development-only dependencies for testing and development workflow
devDependencies._jest_comment: JavaScript testing framework for unit and integration tests
devDependencies._nodemon_comment: Development utility that automatically restarts server when file changes are detected
devDependencies._supertest_comment: Library for testing HTTP endpoints - works with Jest to test API routes
